solution_line_template: On Sunday {friday_yellow} x {multiplier_sunday} = <<{friday_yellow}*{multiplier_sunday}={sunday_yellow}>>{sunday_yellow} papayas turned yellow.
A total of {friday_yellow} + {sunday_yellow} = <<{friday_yellow}+{sunday_yellow}={total_yellow}>>{total_yellow} papayas turned yellow.
There are {initial_green_papayas} - {total_yellow} = <<{initial_green_papayas}-{total_yellow}={remaining_green}>>{remaining_green} green papayas still left on the tree.
